actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to consolidate the administration of defense economic conversion activities in the Executive Office of the President.

summary.text: Directs the President to consolidate within, and coordinate through, the Executive Office of the President all defense conversion, reinvestment, and transition assistance programs of the Department of Defense. Establishes in the Executive Office a Special Assistant to the President for Economic and Defense Conversion. Directs the Secretary of Defense to transfer the Office of Economic Adjustment and the Advanced Research Projects Agency to the jurisdiction of the National Economic Council in the Executive Office of the President. Directs the Secretary of Commerce to transfer the Economic Conversion Information Exchange to the same jurisdiction.

titles.title: A bill to consolidate the administration of defense economic conversion activities in the Executive Office of the President.
